thread.title: Workiva Announces Alaska Airlines, FCA US and Lending Club Will Speak at Annual User ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Workiva Announces Alaska Airlines, FCA US and Lending Club Will Speak at Annual User ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Workiva Announces Alaska Airlines, FCA US and Lending Club Will Speak at Annual User ConferenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Workiva Announces Alaska Airlines, FCA US and Lending Club Will Speak at Annual User Conference
Airlines, FCA US LLC, a subsidiary of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V., and Lending Club will lead a customer panel during the keynote address at the fourth annual Wdesk user conference, The Exchange Community. The conference will be held at the Hyatt Regency in Orlando, Florida, September 14–17.
“More than 1,200 customers have registered to attend our user conference to learn and share their experiences in managing and reporting data across their risk, audit, finance and compliance teams,” said Matt Rizai, Chairman and CEO of Workiva.
Workiva customers will hear other conference speakers, including Arianna Huffington, founder of The Huffington Post, and Susan Cain, The New York Times bestselling author. Attendees will have a chance to earn up to 17 Continuing Professional Education credits at conference sessions, which include:
Compliance
Unstructured Data and Disclosures
SEC Regulations and Reports
Business Data and the SEC
Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX) and Internal Controls
Simplifying SOX and Internal Controls Processes
Evidence Management and Tasking for SOX
SOX Reports and Dashboards
eXtensible Business Reporting Language (XBRL)
Taxonomy, Navigation, and Concept Selection
Disclosures Mapping and Modeling
Business Data and the SEC
Management
Data Collection
Data-Driven Presentations and Dashboards
Dynamic Linking with Wdesk
Regulated Risk
Regulator’s Perspective on Recovery and Resolution Plans (RRP)
CCAR/DFAST Best Practices in Wdesk
RRP Best Practices in Wdesk
Sustainability
Source:-Workiva
